title: Elementist Lux is probably one of the few reasons why Riot isn't in bancrupcy
body: To tell you the truth, the art team did a fantastic job with the skin and showed what one of my main, {{champion:99}} and her fantasy could be. But with so much hate towards Riot's balance team, Sexism, and Pax its safe to say that Riot's cash is dropping like flies. Elementist lux is the light that attracts them.
